newsitem.title: TUNISIA: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX SLIGHTLY UP IN ACTIVE TRADE.
newsitem.headline: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX SLIGHTLY UP IN ACTIVE TRADE.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Wednesday closed slightly up by 0.12 percent in higher trade boosted by over-the-counter exchanges, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 504.27 points from 503.69 on Tuesday.
Total volume was 6.04 million dinars against 1.40 million dinars.

Over-the-counter exchanges amounted to 4.27 million dinars from 374,154 dinars on Tuesday. Turnover on the first market was higher than the daily average amounting to 1.62 million dinars with 73,122 shares changing hands.
Banque Nationale Agricole fell 0.95 dinar or three percent to 30.67 dinars. Banque de Tunisie slid 0.46 dinar to 76.48. STB bank was down 0.2 dinar to 19.2 dinars with 21,350 shares changing hands.
Leasing firm Tunisie Leasing LEAS.TN edged lower 0.2 dinar to 32.5 dinars.
Airliner Tunis Air gained 0.5 dinar to 24 dinars. Chemical firm Al-Kimia rose 0.3 dinar to 51.3. Household firm Ateliers Mecaniques du Sahel was up 0.2 dinar to 13.2 dinars.
Banque Internationale Arabe de Tunisie advanced 0.2 dinar to 36.7 dinars. ($1= 1.09 dinar)
